channel.title: Go Humble! RSS GAMES
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle games bundles!

item.title: Uncharted Realms Bundle
item.content:encoded: Explore strange new corners of the cosmos with the Uncharted Realms Bundle! Investigate the unknown mystery behind a distress call from a Martian mining site in Fort Solis. Discover unusual and exciting alien planets—as weird and adorable aliens in The Eternal Cylinder. Is this world human ready? Play as a quirky planet evaluator in Journey to the Savage Planet, and more. Pay what you want for out-of-this-world space games—and help support charity: water with your purchase!

item.title: WB Play the Legends
item.description: The very best from Warner Bros. Games
item.content:encoded:
Love Sub-Zero, Middle-earth, and the Bat Family? The top-selling Warner Bros. Games bundle is back! Experience genre-defining combat as the Dark Knight himself in Batman: Arkham Knight Premium Edition, go toe-to-toe as the strongest and watch the blood drip off Raiden’s fists in Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition, stop the Court of Owls from overrunning Gotham City in Gotham Knights, and more. Satisfy your superhero roleplaying fantasies and help support the Raiden Science Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem your key before February 27th. 2026.

item.title: Better with 4 Friends! Co-Op Bundle
item.content:encoded: Grab your besties for a co-op game night with the all-new Better With 4 Friends Bundle! Play a variety of hilarious and wacky indie games designed to get the whole squad laughing. Lay track before the train crashes in Unrailed!, turn moving day into pure chaos in Moving Out, and battle blazes together in Embr—plus so much more. Pay what you want for this laugh-packed collection and help support the Michael J. Fox Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Sniper Elite: Classics Collection
item.content:encoded:
Feel the exhilaration of lining up the perfect shot with the Sniper Elite: Classics Collection. Choose from dozens of rifles, maps, and targets across 5 complete Sniper Elite titles—including the Sniper Elite 5 and Sniper Elite 4 Deluxe. Relive sweet shots with the awesome Kill Cam and immerse yourself in the strategic gameplay. Pay what you want for hours of in-depth gunplay from the ultimate shooting simulation experience, and help support The Trevor Project with your purchase.

The Trevor Project was not involved in the selection of the content in this promotion and the views, opinions, and ideas expressed in the games are not endorsed by, and do not reflect or represent the views and opinions of The Trevor Project.
